snippet: A legendary baseball coach at George Washington High School was suspended before he was given a hearing on an illegal recruitment charge he denies.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on George Washington High School baseball coach Steve Mandl, who has been struggling with a lengthy and questionable suspension over mere allegations that he had violated athletic recruiting rules; says Mandl's case demonstrates how petty, meritless charges can get traction and turn the disciplinary process in New York's education system into its own form of punishment long before a verdict has been reached.
lead_paragraph: A legendary baseball coach at George Washington High School was suspended before he was given a hearing on an illegal recruitment charge he denies.

headline.seo: Baseball Coach Steve Mandl Suspended Before a Hearing Is Held
